feed.title: SAP Community - HCM (Human Capital Management)

entry.title: Help needed on AI agent for HR processes in HCM
entry.content: I am techno functional consultant and working in transformation in HCM space. How can we reimagine HR process and come up with high level framework or solution with infused AI agents in the existing process. Since I am new to SAP and SuccessFactors and have been tasked to work on Using Native AI agent and work for building AI agent for HR processes, can you please provide me a detailed process maps or blueprint with the processes and the sub processes and where we can use the AI agents and make the HR processes more streamlined. Can you provide me techno functional documentation and write-up or Use Case that I can refer and create some solution. We want to propose new Operating model using Native AI agent in the existing process like Recruitment, Onboarding. Employee Lifecycle Management, Core HR, Payroll, Separation

entry.title: SAP Academy Instructor Manuals
entry.content:
Hi All,

What is the correct process to follow with regards to old hard copies of SAP Manuals? I was a SAP Academy Instructor many years ago and have HR manuals printed in the 2012 versions. I would like to bless someone with this content as it could help young learners that might want to explore the ERP industry and does not have corporate experience yet. The manuals could still serve as foundational knowledge. However, I do want to follow the correct legal avenue regarding this and do not just want to throw it away. May I donate it to someone or a learning center?
I am based in South Africa.

entry.title: Validation for only employee without allowance is able to submit transportation claim in Concur
entry.content:
Hi All FI, SuccessFactors, and Concur Experts.

If we may know,
currently there is an inquiry from the end-user about the feasibility of set-up a kind of validation or restriction rule to only employee that receive "monthly transport allowance" will not be able to submit "taxi/transportation charges" claim via SAP Concur system.

Would you like to kindly help us on giving advice whether there is any specific technical field or information that we could use as such an indicator to know which personel number of employee that receive "monthly transport allowance" in SAP FI or SAP SuccessFactors? to be further integrated or acknowledged (captured) by the Concur system then.

Thank you so much, and we are looking forward to discussing this with you.

Ani.

@RafaelMira @Ronak_Jhuthawat @jacqting @Michaela_Sedlicka @LeoSupriano @katharina_sorge @yogeshgsalvi @harinarasimha @siddharthrajora 

SAP S/4HANA integration with SAP Concur solutions SAP Concur SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central integration to SAP Business Suite HCM (Human Capital Management) FIN Travel Management

entry.title: HCM P&F/Fiori Start Processes for multiple employees or objects
entry.content:
I have been searching by I didn't find any information about the possibility to start a process for several employees in the App Start Processes. There is this option in the configuration of the process "M Enable Mass Start Process" but I guess it doesn't work in the App Start Process directly but in the WD app Mass Start Processes. Can someone confirm?

 

Thanks!

entry.title: Categorizing Goals in Performance Form by Category Name
entry.content:
I would like to know if there is a way to categorize goals within the Goal section of the Performance Form so that each goal appears under its respective category name. The intended behavior is that when a user expands a category, all goals belonging to that category are displayed.

Note: Client using Legacy Performance Form

entry.title: HR FUNCTION: PPPAR R
entry.content:
hello guys.

i have to create action(infotype 0000) 02- dispatch.

i wanna the action isn't recieve salary

i  find Existing logic excute no salary .

using HR Function PPPAR  R, if PPPAR R IS R, ouput is nothing.(rule is XPPF)

so  /801 has deleted. and then using /801 MULTI basic salary.

so that man cant receive salary.

I have question. Why the logic face to R when action is no salary

then, how can i connect perssenal action to that funcion?

entry.title: how to set the data effective date always equal to the end date of a range filter?
entry.content:
Hi, I'm building a report to analyze hiring quality in SF story report by calculating the 12-month rolling retention rate (% of new hires still with company).

I've encountered a data recency issue. Since employee status is live, the report results change daily. I need the results for a specific period to be fixed.

For example (Oct 2024 - Sep 2025):

  • 95 new hires in total.
  • Today's data: 15 are left.
  • Data as of Sep 30, 2025: 12 are left.

My Goal: I want the report to always use the status as of the period's end date (e.g., Sep 30, 2025 for the Oct 24-Sep 25 period), regardless of when the report is run.

Is there a solution to automatically set the "Data Effective Date" to equal the "Duration End Date"?

Thanks for your help.

entry.title: Country Picklist- Comma in Korea causing issues
entry.content:
Hello,

WE HAVE COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE PICKLIST THAT HAS SAP STANDARD KOREA LABELS WITH COMMAS:

  1. Korea, Republic of
  2. Korea, Democratic People's Republic of

 

PROVISIONING ONBOARDING REPORT THAT FEEDS TO OUR SFTP THEN SAP ECC IS IMPACTING OUR INTERNAL JOBS IN SAP ECC BECAUSE THE COMMA IS COMING OVER FROM SUCCESSFACTORS LABEL.

CAN SAP STRIP THE COMMA IN BACK-END SO IT DOESNT IMPACT SAP ECC?                                                                                 

We already tried adding QUOTES " on the field that gets sent and it is supposed to tell the system to ignore the comma in the field and just look at everything in between the " " as the label but thats not working.

Thanks

entry.title: Variable Pay-Custom Basis Calculation and Role Change Adjustment
entry.content:
Hello experts.

Our client requested the creation of a plan without targets, where the basis will be calculated using a custom calculation. They asked us to investigate whether it would be possible to adjust the Target Bonus percentage in some way, applying a proportional adjustment in cases where an employee changes role during the year.

For example, if an employee moves from job code X to job code Y after six months, and we kept the %Target Bonus from the effective date on 31/12/yyyy, the percentage would end up being lower. Ηow historical records from Job Info fields can be included in a custom calculation and influence the final result.

Does anyone have something to suggest or any advice?

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: save certificates of wage tax deduction in archivelink storage
entry.content:
Hi,

Which transaction should we use to 

  1. generate certificates of wage tax deductions for a lot of employees
  2. put this documents in an archivelink storage in a way each document is linked to its employee?

Is there any documentation to configure the transaction and the storage for this hcm documents?

Best Regards, Ralph

entry.title: Support needed – Change Log Report for SAP HCM Infotypes
entry.content:
Hello,

I need support to develop a report/transaction in SAP HCM that shows which user made changes and the date/time of each change for the following infotypes:
0000, 0001, 0002, 0006, 0008, 0009, 0016, and 0021 (for IT0021, the report must display records by dependent – validate SUBTY).

The report should read the information directly from the standard PA tables.

Could you please advise on the best approach and required tables/fields?

Thank you

Vanessa

entry.title: Best practices for End year - HCM and FI
entry.content: Hello Team ! I've just started working with HCM and FI. I don't have so much experience at all and I was wodering if you can give me some advices regarding all the activities for year-end related with HCM - FI Modules and if you have any best practices to follow while doing the steps. For example, I'm really interested on how you are extending calendars, checking if all the notes for the next years are applied, benefits new tax wages, if you use some checklists I can follow etc. Thank you so much in advance for helping this new developer !

entry.title: All infotype segments data should be sent when triggering RHALESMD for HRMD_A
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a requirement of sending HR masterdata via HRMD_A message type. I have configured most of the part and data is being sent.
One of my requirement is, I wat to send data based on change pointers. i.e. data should be sent for those employees who have been changed since last run. It is working fine too. But it is only sending changed data. I want all infotypes segments to be sent when I run program RHALESMD to send idocs for change pointers. 
Any idea on how to achieve this?

Regards
Param

entry.title: Lumpsum issue - guidelines show 0 and Lumpsum field cannot be filled in the form
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm using the lumpsum in the form and i do have this uploaded:

LUMPSUM_ELIGIBLELUMPSUM_TARGET
LUMPSUM_ELIGIBLELUMPSUM_TARGET
FALSE0
FALSE0
TRUE11120
FALSE0
TRUE40000
TRUE11716.2
TRUE233526.7
TRUE523635.8
TRUE21000
TRUE3815.396

Now when I launch the form, Lumpsum target is shown correctly but Lumpsum guidelines show 0 for all people and Lumpsum allocation field cannot be filled by the planner. 

 

it looks like Lumpsum eligibility works  as some rows its greyed out and some not, but again i cannot fill anything in the field in the form.

what can be an issue? 

Thanks

entry.title: Time Types Split in SALDO Table
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am struck with an issue in Time management. In our current Time Evaluation we accumulate the total scheduled hours in a Time Type "ZNEH" which is currently going beyond the set limit of 7 by SAP.  This is triggering a Time Evaluation DUMP, the only solution we can think of is splitting the Time Type and saving the additional Hours beyond 99999.99 in another Time Type "ZNE1". I have created the Time Type and also created a PCR as below, but nothing works. When i Run Time Eval I see the new Time Types but with Value "0", as i think its picking them from table T555A. Any Solutions will be highly appreciated.

Time Type 1: ZNEH

Time type for additional Hours: ZNE1

ZMAXH: Constant Value from t511k - 99999.99

Regards,

Shahnaaz

entry.title: Custom field with lookup formula, returns N/A after filling merit etc.
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I have a strange problem with the simple custom field that uses lookup formula to bring data from some lookup table.

when i launch the form, the fields shows the expected numbers but the moment i try to fill some merit or other recommendation for specific employee, the field of that employee changes to N/A value and stays like that. 

what can be an issue? 

 

Thanks

entry.title: Run command line (DOS prompt) on local PC using WEBGUI
entry.content:
Dear expert,

We are migrating customer system from ECC6.0 to ECP

Our customer has asked me to use WEBGUI to run a command line (DOS prompt) on a local PC (to launch Excel or a BAT file). This works with SAPGUI in ECP however our customer hope to execute WEBGUI.

Specifically, WS_EXECUTE is used in an add-on program, and I have confirmed that this function does not work with WebGUI.

I tried changing CL_GUI_FRONTEND_SERVICES=>EXECUTE, but it did not work until I executed the command line on the local PC.

Is it possible to get the same behavior as the above WS_EXECUTE to work with WebGUI?

entry.title: User validation error due to mandatory Event Reason for Job Information from the 2H 2025 release.
entry.content:
Hello team,

As you know, starting with the 2H 2025 Release, the Event Reason field is now mandatory for the ONB-RCM integration. If it is not mapped, this change will trigger a business process error, preventing the candidate from moving from ONB to RCM
 
There are several blogs and KBAs that explain how to address/prevent this issue, either by creating a business rule or by using the Recruit-to-Hire Data Mapping tool (0003205529, 3232848, 0003671856 ). 
 
After analyzing the available options, we decided to map it using the Recruit-to-Hire Data Mapping tool. However, even after implementing this solution, we are still facing issues in our test environment, so I hope someone here can help us address them.
 
As mentioned in the notes I shared earlier, I created a custom picklist field in each existing job requisition, using external code values identical to the existing hire event external codes in EC.
Event reason custom field in job requisition
 
 

Matching picklist used for job requisition custom field

Then, I mapped the corresponding field in JobInfo

 

After doing all that, it is supposed to fix the mandatory event reason issue but we keep getting the following error:

I got a JSON Output response to check the values passed from recruiting to onboarding and it looks like this 

 
It seems that the event reason value is being passed correctly; however, even after restarting the process from BPE, the issue persists. As a result, the onboardee remains stuck with a data validation error and does not appear in the ONB dashboard

 For context:

  1. I have tested with multiple candidates in different job Reqs and the behavior is the same, 
  2. The event-reason standard field wasn't created in manage business configuration so I created it recently (I don't know how ONB worked before that)
I’m sharing my experience with this configuration to get any suggestions, as I honestly don’t understand what’s happening here

I already opened a SAP Support ticket, if I receive a solution or an explication, I'll share it later.

entry.title: How to Identify Source Tables and Fields for Legal Parameters in SAP HR Payroll
entry.content:
Hello,

As you know, there are many SAP standard tables where rates and parameters are maintained for payroll calculations. These values are later used in payroll schemas and rules to produce payroll results.

When a legal parameter changes, I would like to understand how I can identify from which table and which specific field the system is reading the data.
For example, tables such as T7TRG01, V_T7TRG02, V_T7TRT01, V_T7TRT02, V_T7TRT03, and similar ones.

My usual approach is to start from a wage type generated for a specific personnel number and then trace it backwards. During this process, I often end up at table T596F, but at that point I still cannot clearly identify which field or logic is used to calculate the wage type.

Is there an easier or more systematic way to analyze this?
If you have any known methods, best practices, or tips for tracing payroll calculations back to their source tables and fields, I would really appreciate your guidance.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Enes
